name: The Redtonic Blues By Ashton Tekno Persaud

metadata.name: The Redtonic Blues
metadata.description: It was always a dream of mine to capture the winter street nights of New York City. I am usually a lone wolf and keep to myself. This is a thing I would love to change. Itâ€™s a working progress. Red brings the life out of me and fills a fire within to keep pushing forward. The Blues keep me calm, collected, and motivated in moments of despair, sadness, and anxiety in a fast-paced world. Walking with my headphones on, jamming to my tunes, with the magic of snow falling on the winter night while eating ice cream, there is simply nothing like it. This is how I turn the Reds and Blues into something positive and keep it moving.
